source: Wikipedia hospital list + direct website verification + caring.com/seniorliving.org data
notes: Decision makers: Facility Managers, VP of Operations, Director of Support Services, Office Managers. Healthcare facilities have staff/visitors 24/7 = constant vending demand. Many already have vending - opportunity is UPGRADE or REPLACE outdated machines.

prospects.parent_system: Valley Health System / Universal Health Services (UHS)
prospects.notes: Verified via hendersonhospital.com. Part of Valley Health System (6 hospitals). Newer facility (opened 2016) = modern common areas. UHS corporate may manage vending contracts centrally. Target: facility manager for local machines, or corporate purchasing for system-wide deal.

prospects.address: 6900 N Durango Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89149
prospects.parent_system: Valley Health System / Universal Health Services (UHS)
prospects.notes: Verified via centennialhillshospital.com. 339 beds, 354,000 sq ft. Opened 2008. Large staff + visitors = high vending volume. Same parent system as Henderson Hospital = bundle opportunity. Lobby, waiting areas, staff break rooms all need vending.

prospects.address: 3186 S Maryland Pkwy, Las Vegas, NV 89109
prospects.facility_type: Acute Care Hospital / Level II Trauma
prospects.notes: Verified via sunrisehospital.com. Largest hospital in Nevada at 688 beds. Level II Trauma Center. Massive staff and visitor population. HCA likely has existing national vending contracts - check for local supplement opportunities. Break rooms, waiting areas, ER waiting room.

prospects.address: 3100 N Tenaya Way, Las Vegas, NV 89128
prospects.notes: Verified via mountainview-hospital.com. Second HCA property - leverage Sunrise relationship. Northwest Las Vegas location. Large cardiac center = long patient stays = more vending use.

prospects.address: 9300 W Sunset Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89148
prospects.notes: Verified via southernhillshospital.com. Third HCA property. Southwest Las Vegas. 80-bed behavioral health unit = secure area vending needs. Three freestanding ER locations also need vending.

prospects.company: Dignity Health - St. Rose Dominican, Siena Campus
prospects.notes: Verified via dignityhealth.org. Henderson's only pediatric ER. Large campus. Dignity Health/CommonSpirit is massive health system - may have national contracts. Target local facility manager for supplemental placement opportunities.

prospects.company: Dignity Health - St. Rose Dominican, Rose de Lima Campus
prospects.address: 102 E Lake Mead Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89015
prospects.notes: Verified via dignityhealth.org. Original Henderson hospital location. Downtown Henderson. Older facility may have outdated vending = upgrade opportunity. Bundle with Siena and San Martin campuses.

prospects.company: Dignity Health - St. Rose Dominican, San Martin Campus
prospects.address: 8280 W Warm Springs Rd, Las Vegas, NV 89113
prospects.notes: Verified via dignityhealth.org. Newsweek ranked #1 hospital in Nevada (2026). Southwest Las Vegas. Newer campus. High prestige = high standards for vending quality. Third Dignity campus = triple deal opportunity.

prospects.address: 1800 W Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89102
prospects.facility_type: Acute Care / Level I Trauma Center / Teaching Hospital
prospects.contact_title: Director of Plant Operations / Purchasing Manager
prospects.notes: Nevada's only Level I Trauma Center and public hospital. Teaching hospital for UNLV School of Medicine. MASSIVE foot traffic. Government-run = may require RFP/bid process. Longest sales cycle but biggest potential contract in the valley.

prospects.address: 657 N Town Center Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89144
prospects.parent_system: Valley Health System / Universal Health Services (UHS)
prospects.notes: Third Valley Health System hospital. Summerlin is the wealthiest part of Las Vegas = premium vending products. Large campus. Can bundle with Henderson Hospital and Centennial Hills for system-wide deal.

prospects.address: 5400 S Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118
prospects.parent_system: Valley Health System / Universal Health Services (UHS)
prospects.notes: Fourth Valley Health System hospital. Southwest Las Vegas. UHS system-wide deal could cover 6 acute care hospitals + 7 freestanding ERs = massive vending network.

prospects.address: 1555 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy, Henderson, NV 89012
prospects.notes: Verified via caring.com - 4.4 stars, 46 reviews, Caring Stars winner. Major national senior living brand. Staff + visitors + mobile residents = vending demand. Easy-access machines needed. Healthy options important for healthcare setting.

prospects.address: 2000 N Rampart Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89128
prospects.notes: Verified via seniorliving.org - 4.5 stars. Atria is a major national brand (part of Ventas Inc). Summerlin location = affluent area. Staff break rooms + visitor areas = vending placement. National brand may have preferred vendor list - check.

prospects.address: 3450 N Buffalo Dr, Las Vegas, NV 89129
prospects.notes: Verified via seniorliving.org listing. 155-bed skilled nursing facility. Staff working 24/7 shifts = high vending demand especially nights/weekends when cafeteria closed. Break room placement is key.

prospects.address: 8501 Del Webb Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89134
prospects.notes: Verified via seniorliving.org listing. 225 rooms - one of the largest SNFs in the area. Established 2006. Staff + visitors = steady demand. Large facility = multiple machine placement opportunities. Del Webb area = upscale Summerlin.

outreach_strategy.step1: Research existing vending contracts at each facility (often have exclusive deals)
outreach_strategy.step2: Contact Facility Director / Director of Support Services
outreach_strategy.step3: For hospital systems (HCA, UHS, Dignity), identify regional VP of operations for system-wide deal
outreach_strategy.step4: Lead with healthy options + modern cashless technology as differentiator
outreach_strategy.step5: Offer 24/7 service commitment - critical for healthcare settings
outreach_strategy.pitch_angle: Modern machines with healthy options for staff wellness programs, cashless payment, guaranteed uptime with 24/7 service
outreach_strategy.key_insight: Valley Health System (UHS) = 6 hospitals + 7 freestanding ERs. Single relationship could yield 13+ locations.
